targets.expr:
sum(       
    node:node_cpu_utilisation:avg1m{} * on (node) group_left() 
    (kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores{} * on (node) group_left kube_node_labels{node=~"$node"})    
)

sum(    
    label_replace(      
        container_memory_usage_bytes{pod_name!="",container_name=""},       
        "pod", "$1", "pod_name", "(.*)"    )    
        * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:{node=~"$node"}  
    )  
/ 
sum (kube_node_status_allocatable_memory_bytes{node=~"$node"})

sum(       
    node:node_cpu_utilisation:avg1m{} * on (node) group_left() 
    (kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores{} * on (node) group_left kube_node_labels{node=~"$node"})    
)

sum(    
    label_replace(      
        container_memory_usage_bytes{pod_name!="",container_name=""},       
        "pod", "$1", "pod_name", "(.*)"    )    
        * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:{node=~"$node"}  
    )  
/ 
sum (kube_node_status_allocatable_memory_bytes{node=~"$node"})
